The PolMine Project is now a registered CLARIN centre, i.e. it is listed here. As a category C CLARIN centre, we offer metadata for the data resulting from the PolMine project that can be harvested by a web service. Most importantly, our data can now be explored through the Virtual Language Observatory (VLO). The data itself is available for registered academic users through our GitLab server (gitlab.sowi.uni-due.de).
